scripts.dev: yarn workspace @academic-next/desktop compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @academic-next/desktop compile -w" "yarn workspace @academic-next/web start" "yarn workspace @academic-next/mobile start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn workspace @academic-next/desktop start"
scripts.dev:desktop: cross-env BROWSER=none concurrently "yarn dev:web" "yarn workspace @academic-next/desktop compile -w" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn workspace @academic-next/desktop start"
scripts.dev:mobile: yarn workspace @academic-next/mobile compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @academic-next/mobile compile -w" "yarn workspace @academic-next/mobile start"
scripts.dev:web: yarn workspace @academic-next/web compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @academic-next/web compile -w" "yarn workspace @academic-next/web start"
